# Getting started

Go to Github classroom to  accept the invitation to create a repository for this assignment  at [HW6](https://classroom.github.com/a/QaLxnGVH) 

This will create a private repo in the organization on Github with your github user name. 
Hit refresh, to see the link for the repo, and then click on it to go to the  organization in Github.

Follow the instructions in the README in your repo and in the  Rnw file to complete the assignment. 

## Github Classroom & Gradescope

You MUST submit your final `Rnw` and  `pdf` files to the repo on Github and upload the `pdf` to Gradescope. Please remember to push your updates to GitHub regularly.
